text:
the claude agent sdk will do for knowledge work in 2026 what claude code did for coding in 2025.

want to live in the future?

build your own agents with it.

you’ll have a personal magic tool belt that the public won’t have for another 6-12mo.

it 100% feels like personal agi.
@mckaywrigley If you're technical and not messing with this right now you're basically choosing to be slow
What's your most underrated Claude Code trick?
@alexalbert__ Ask it to assume a Steve Jobs persona when I need a site or message distilled and designed. Almost always takes a different line than I would have thought.
